title: Docker Integration Specification
description: Docker integration on S² manifold with spherical storage and < 50ms pull latency

operations.name: operation_1_docker_integration
operations.description: Operation 1 for Docker Integration Specification - comprehensive geometric integration operation

algorithm.complexity: O(n log n) for n-dimensional manifold

edge_cases.handling: Apply regularization, use numerical stability techniques
edge_cases.mitigation: Epsilon smoothing near singularities

edge_cases.handling: Return error requiring Tier 2+ for cross-manifold operations
edge_cases.mitigation: Validate tier before attempting cross-manifold operations

edge_cases.handling: Apply appropriate boundary handling (periodic, reflective, absorbing)
edge_cases.mitigation: Manifold-specific boundary logic

edge_cases.handling: Use higher precision arithmetic, validate results
edge_cases.mitigation: Error bounds checking and retry with adjusted parameters

edge_cases.handling: Clamp to manifold-specific safe ranges
edge_cases.mitigation: Input validation and range checking

edge_cases.handling: Return INTEGRATION_NOT_FOUND error
edge_cases.mitigation: Validate integration exists and is active before operation

test_cases.name: Operation with numerical stability check - operation 1
